name: Suicidal Wizard!
description:
A Platformer Game Did Wrong(And That's Okay!)

Made in 72 hours for The 2nd Annual Hwlo Game Jam.

Downloadable for Windows, Mac and GNU/Linux(Linux) Or Playable in browser. [Provided Browser Build Has Some Bugs]

Source Code Available At https://github.com/lostybtw/Suicidal-Wizard

Strongly Encouraged To Compile From Source And Play On GNU/Linux .

A Lonely Wizard Living in The Woods Bound to the forest, Must Go On A Journey to Collect Flags as Keys To The Binds.

A Small Platforming Game Intending To "Do The Genre Wrong(Which Is Okay!)"

Thank You,

Fellow Developer,  Losty
